I was trying to consider a visual theme for Tucson and I think I have an id=
ea.  Instead of fire which is indicative of dragons and Rodimus, his visual=
 theme is extremely bright, silver lightning, which like it's nature flashe=
s quickly in the sky followed by a loud clap of thunder and in his case, hi=
s sonic like roar that is capable of rattling the ground just like thunder.=
  And this is something that also means change in weather patterns, cleansi=
ng the planet of impurities, such as what's brought upon Old Earth now.  " =
As the storm of light grows near, so the warrior, of pure Silver shall appe=
ar."
